content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ home services. Could I please have your name to start your service request?
Thank you, John. Can you please provide your address so I can check if our plumbing services are available in your area?
Thanks, John. Let me check service availability in your area.

John, it appears your address is outside of our normal service range. We understand this is inconvenient. However, we sometimes can make special arrangements for urgent plumbing needs. Can you tell me more about the issue you are experiencing?
I have a major leak thatâ€™s flooding my basement. I need someone fast.
That definitely sounds urgent, John, and we want to help. I will check with our team for any special emergency availability near your area.
Our schedule is currently full for today, but I can offer a first thing tomorrow morning appointment to take care of the leak urgently. Would that work for you?
I guess that will have to do. Please book it.
Thank you, John. I am booking your plumbing service appointment for tomorrow morning. One moment, please.

Your appointment is booked for tomorrow morning to address the leak at your property. We will send you a reminder before the visit. If you have any other questions please let us know. Have a good day!
